activities.name: Copy data from table to csv file

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/11 Senario copy dynamically data from staging to Destination')]
[concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/12 sol 2 copy data dable to table')]
[concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/13 sol 3 copy data dable to table in database')]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select WatermarkDateTime from Project.WatermarkTable
where tablename='Products'

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from Project.Products Where ModifiedDate >''',activity('Watermark Date Time').output.firstRow.watermarkDateTime,'''and ModifiedDate <=''', activity('Max_ModifiedDate').output.firstRow.Max_ModifiedDate,''''Â )

activities.name: Migrating Data from OnPrimes to Cloud

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from ',item().TableName,' where ModifiedDate> ''',activity('WatermarkDate').output.value[0].WatermarkDateTime,''' and ModifiedDate <= ''',activity('Max Modified Date from Tables').output.value[0].Max_Modified_Date,'''')

dependsOn.activity: Migrating Data from OnPrimes to Cloud

text.value:
@concat('update Project.WatermarkTable set
WatermarkDateTime =''',activity('Max Modified Date from Tables').output.value[0].Max_Modified_Date,''' Where TableName = ''',item().TableName,'''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TableName from dbo.TableList
where flag=1
